name: Long cold dark demo
description:
Chris has crashed his car on a dark road to a forest and lost his memory. Who is he? Where does he come from and what does he do? For now it doesent matter, the important thing is to get help. 

This is no ordinary forest though, and soon demons from his shattered psyche start to catch up with him. The past always catches up with you. Haunts you. It can even kill you if you are not careful.
